answer:
From your question, it is not clear which immunization(s) he received. Most vaccines require more than one dose over time to produce immunity and long-lasting protection. The number of doses needed depends on the type of vaccine. The FAQ about vaccine schedules is here. If you have questions about completing his vaccine schedule, please speak with your immunizing health care provider.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## From your question, it is not clear which immunization(s) he received.

Most vaccines require more than one dose over time to produce immunity and long-lasting protection.
The number of doses needed depends on the type of vaccine.
The FAQ about vaccine schedules is here.
If you have questions about completing his vaccine schedule, please speak with your immunizing health care provider.
Immunization Nurse
question: If a 14 year old has the first immunization will he need two more or is one enough?
question_variation_0: how many shots does one need for immunization a 14 year old need
question_variation_1: what should be done before immunization
question_variation_2: how long will it take a 14 year old to get his first immunization
